label: Printing Equipment
description: Machines and tools used for printing and related activities.

subcategories.label: Offset Printers
subcategories.description: Printing machines that use a flat plate to transfer ink onto paper.

subcategories.label: Digital Printers
subcategories.description: Printing machines that use digital files to print onto paper or other materials.

subcategories.label: Letterpress Printers
subcategories.description: Printing machines that use raised type or images to press ink onto paper.

subcategories.label: Sublimation Printers
subcategories.description: Printing machines that use heat to transfer dye onto materials such as fabric or plastic.

subcategories.label: Hydrographics Equipment
subcategories.description: Equipment used for hydrographic printing, which involves transferring designs onto three-dimensional objects using water and a special film.
